name: Breach Quanta
dec: Temporarily stalls Hull Breach. Cooldown of 300s.

name: Battle Stations
dec: Boosts turret damage for a temporary duration. Cooldown of 240s.

name: Death Blossom
dec: Removes turret cooldowns for a temporary duration. Cooldown of 300s.

name: Fire Suppression
dec: Extinguishes a number of fire hazards and or electrical hazards. Cooldown of 300s.

name: Flow Burn
dec: Temporarily increases Speed and Boost Speed. Cooldown of 240s.

name: Form Up
dec: Recalls all Crew Members to the Railjack and heal them. Cooldown of 240s.

name: Intruder Stasis
dec: Temporarily freezes all Enemy Boarding Parties. Cooldown of 300s.

name: Squad Renew
dec: Heals all Railjack squad members. Cooldown of 300s.

name: Void Cloak
dec: Cloaks the Railjack at the expense of engine speed. Cooldown of 120s.
